message: Let's split it 60/40.  Fair deal, I think!
I think I can do better than that. You're going to have to do better than 60/40 if you want me to accept.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  50/50 is the fairest way to split it now that inflation is starting to bite.
I'm not sure 50/50 is fair, considering the inflation has already reduced our gains. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still want a better deal.
